creditline: Gift of LeRoy and Cathie Draine in appreciation of Nigerian art and culture
description: figure at L pulling a passenger in chariot; third figure in background holds parasol over passenger; bright orange and yellow background with abstracted geometric designs in black
markings: lower margin in pencil: 3/5 (Artist proof) | mark on back in pencil: Cathie Draine
signed: lower margin, in pencil: A Ride in the City of Golden Dust | -Deep etching | Bruce Onobrakpeya | Jan. 1971
title: A Ride in the City of Golden Dust
